instructions inside these brackets are made into the same stitch or space and repeated as directed - stitch counts are given inside these brackets special stitches fasten_off - cut yarn with about a 15cm/6in tail unless otherwise instructed pull up on crochet hook to pull yarn tail through the loop on your hook invisible join - thread yarn tail onto a tapestry needle place needle from front to back through both front and back loops of 2nd stitch of the round now insert needle into the last stitch of the round and pull through gently now insert needle through front and back loops of þrst stitch of round and pull through gently this makes the join invisible and þnishes your round off neatly weave the end in and trim end close to your work the video tutorial shows clearly how to make the invisible join if youõre new to these itõs not absolutely necessary so if youõd prefer to use a slip_stitch join to þnish round 3 please do so spike single_crochet - a spike single_crochet is worked one or more rounds below the working round insert hook into magic_ring as instructed draw up a longer loop to the height of the working round yarn over pull through two loops on hook poppy flower 4 crochet road poppy flower pattern click here for full video tutorial flower centre grey round 1 into a magic_ring ch1 doesnõt count as st 12hdc into ring keeping a medium sized opening in centre of ring join with slip st in þrst st donõt fasten_off 12hdc yellow stamen round 2 pull up a loop of yellow yarn in grey working loop pull on grey yarn to tighten work 12 spike single_crochet into opening in centre working evenly over top of grey sts join with slip st in þrst st pull up loop of grey in yellow working loop pull on grey yarn end to close magic_ring fasten_off yellow 12sc poppy flower 5 crochet road grey round 3 2sc in each st around fasten_off join with invisible join 24sc flower petals red þrst petal only pull up a loop of red yarn in any st row 1 front ch3 counts as st pm in 3rd chain double_crochet in þrst st 2dc in next st double_crochet in next st two times 2dc in next st turn 10dc poppy flower 6 crochet road row 2 back 2sc in þrst st pm in þrst single_crochet single_crochet in next 8 sts 2sc in marked top of ch3 turn 12sc row 3 front ch2 counts as st pm in 2nd chain skip þrst st 3hdc in each st across to last two sts skip next st half_double_crochet in marked last st turn 29hdc poppy flower 7 crochet road row 4 back single_crochet in each st across turn 29sc row 5 front
